S01sumagavu:sumav_1_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājāmātyair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍair gandharvaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme.
S01sumagavu:sumav_2_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī.
S01sumagavu:sumav_3_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_3_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_3_3: sāṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_4_0: dārikā jātā, abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_5_0: puṇḍravardhane 'pi ca nagare mūṣilo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī.
S01sumagavu:sumav_7_0: yadā bhagavatānuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ tadā sarve 'nyatīrthyā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ pratyantaṃ samāśritāḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_7_1: kecit gauḍikaṃ grāmaṃ, kecit puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_8_1: sa ca nirgranthair ucyate: kim arthaṃ tvaṃ no vivāhayasīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_8_2: sa provāca: patnī me sadṛśī na vidyate. ta ūcur: anāthapiṇḍadasya duhitā sumāgadhā nāmāsti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_9_0: tato 'sau sahaśravaṇād eva tasyāṃ saṃraktacitto babhūva.
S01sumagavu:sumav_9_4: sā tena dṛṣṭā. sahadarśanād evātīva saṃraktacitto babhūva.
S01sumagavu:sumav_10_0: tataḥ sumāgadhā tam asaṃvṛtendriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasitā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_10_1: āha ca: asaṃprajānā ime 'nyatīrthyā bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhṇantīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_10_2: tataḥ so 'pi tayā saha prahasito bhikṣāṃ gṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_11_0: tataḥ puṇḍravardhanaṃ gatvā pitur niveditavān. tena sā dārikā śrāvastīṃ gatvā yācitā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_12_1: bhagavān āha: gṛhapate, pravrajitām idam akaraṇīyam. api tu yadi sumāgadhā puṇḍravardhanaṃ yāsyati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_13_0: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sumāgadhā mahatā śrisamudayena vṛṣabhadattāya dattā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_14_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasmin gṛhe nirgranthā bhuñjate,
S01sumagavu:sumav_15_0: tasyā buddhir abhavat: nūnaṃ sthavirāryaśāradvatīputramahāmaudgalyāyanāryānandaprabhṛtayo mahāśrāvakā upanimantritā iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_16_0: tayā te nirgranthāḥ kākapakṣamalinā malapaṭalavastrā durgandhaśarīrā nagnāḥ pretasadṛśā dṛṣṭvā ca punar durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_17_0: sā śvaśruṇocyate: dārike, kimarthaṃ parikhinnāsīti. sā provāca: ārye, yady evaṃvidhā dakṣinīyāḥ. pāpakārinaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśā bhavantīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_18_0: sā kathayati: dārike, 'sti kaścid ebhyo 'nyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā loke.
S01sumagavu:sumav_19_0: sā kathayati: asti śrāvastyāṃ pitur me vihāre sa bhagavān upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddhaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_19_3: punar aparaṃ, sa bhagavān āḍhyāt kulāt pravrajito 'dīnāt.
S01sumagavu:sumav_19_4: punar aparaṃ, sa bhagavān daharas taruṇaḥ pratyagrayauvanasamanvāgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_20_1: tasmin samaye 'kāmakānāṃ jñātīnām sāśrukaṇṭhānāṃ rudanmukhānāṃ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāśāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_21_0: punar aparaṃ, bhagavān dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato 'sītyanuvyañjanair virājitagātro vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_21_1: sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaḥ, jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako 'bhirūpako darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_22_0: jñātvā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā, sanidānaṃ śrāvakānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati nānidānaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_22_1: saniḥsaraṇaṃ nāniḥsaraṇaṃ, saparikramaṃ nāparikramaṃ, sapratisaraṇaṃ nāpratisaraṇaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_23_1: alam utpannānāṃ paravādināṃ saha dharmeṇa nirgṛhītā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_24_2: ehīti svāgatavādī, kalyāṇavākyaḥ sa bhagavān bāhyakaraṇopetaś,
S01sumagavu:sumav_25_0: āryadharmatayā nyāyadharmatayā virajadharmatayā atuladharmatayā labdhasahāyaḥ sa bhagavān,
S01sumagavu:sumav_25_1: bahavo 'sya sahāyakāḥ śīlasaṃpannāḥ samādhisaṃpannāḥ prajñāsaṃpannā vimuktisaṃpannā vimuktijñānasaṃpannāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_26_0: punar aparaṃ; sa bhagavān yaṃ grāmakṣetram upaniśritya viharati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_26_1: na tatra manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā viheṭhayanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_26_3: divyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante, udārāś cāvabhāsāḥ prajñāyante,
S01sumagavu:sumav_26_4: devaḥ kālena kālaṃ samyag vāridhārām anuprayacchatīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_27_0: tasyāḥ sahaśravaṇād eva bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasannaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_27_1: sā prasannacittā kathayati: dārike, śakyasi tvaṃ taṃ bhagavantam asmākam upadarśayitum.
S01sumagavu:sumav_28_0: sā kathayati: ārye, tena hi tvaṃ bhaktaṃ sajjīkuru,
S01sumagavu:sumav_29_0: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhavanapṛṣṭham abhiruhya maṇḍalakam upalipya puṣpāṇy avakīrya bhagavantam abhinamasya yasyāṃ diśi prativasati tasyāṃ diśi puṣpāṇi kṣipati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_29_1: dhūpaṃ ca dadāti, bhṛṅgārodakaṃ ca bhagavato nimantraṇakaṃ preṣayati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_30_0: sarvajña kāruṇika bho khalu sāṃprataṃ me saṃdarśanaṃ svayam ihāgamanaṃ kurusva /
S01sumagavu:sumav_30_1: saṃghena sāgarasamena samaṃ jitāre āgāminīṃ prativasasva niśām atulyam //
S01sumagavu:sumav_30_2: anugrahārthaṃ bhagavan mamādya kartuṃ narāṇāṃ manasaḥ prasādaṃ /
S01sumagavu:sumav_30_3: rūpasya te darśanamātrakena lokaikanātha kriyatāṃ prasādaḥ //
S01sumagavu:sumav_31_0: tatas tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena haṃsapaṅktir ivākāśe jetavanābhimukhāni saṃprasthitāni,
S01sumagavu:sumav_32_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantaṃ papracha: kuto bhagavann idaṃ nimantraṇakam āyātam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_33_0: puṇḍravardhanād, ānanda, ṣaṣṭyuttarād yojanaśatāt. gacchānanda, bhikṣūṇām ārocaya: śvo yuṣmābhiḥ puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ gantavyaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_34_0: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya gaṇḍīm ākoṭya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya vṛddhānte sthitvā śalākāṃ cārayann evam āha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_36_3: āyuṣmatānandenocyate: sthavira, nedam anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhaṃ gantavyam,
S01sumagavu:sumav_36_4: api tu puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ gantavyaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttarayojanaśataṃ yāvad ṛddhivikurvaṇaṃ kartavyam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_37_1: yāvad dvitīyasya bhikṣoḥ śalākā na dīyate,
S01sumagavu:sumav_37_2: tāvat ṣaḍabhijñām utpādya gajabhujasadṛśaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā kathayati:
S01sumagavu:sumav_37_3: na hi rūpaguṇair na hi sauṣṭhavair na balātkāraguṇair na gauravāt /
S01sumagavu:sumav_37_4: jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñās tu bhavanti madvidhāḥ //
S01sumagavu:sumav_38_0: tataḥ prabhatāyām rajanyāṃ sthavirasthavirāḥ svakasvakena ṛddhyanubhāvena saṃprasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_39_0: atha mūṣilapatnī bhagavato 'rthe śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīyāsanakāni prajñapya,
S01sumagavu:sumav_39_1: udakamaṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, bhavanapṛṣṭham abhiruhya, sumāgadhāpi svāminā sārdhaṃ śvaśureṇa bahiḥ sthitā cintayati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_40_0: kiṃ bhagavān āgamiṣyati. atha nāgamisyatīti. athavānyatropanimantrito bhaviṣyati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_41_0: tato bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya yasyāṃ diśi prativasati tām diśaṃ prekṣitum ārabdhā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_42_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinya uragaratham abhinirmāya śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu meghadhvaninirnādena tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_43_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_43_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā, yo 'yam uragarathopaviṣṭaḥ śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyududdyotaṃ darśayamāno meghadhvaninirnādena ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_44_1: anena bhagavatā bārāṇasyāṃ dharme deśyamāne tatprathamato vairāgyam adhigatam ayaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇādhigamaprāptānām agro nirdiṣṭah,
S01sumagavu:sumav_45_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmāñ chāriputraḥ siṃharatham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā rddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_46_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_46_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ siṃharathenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_47_0: sā kathayati: nāyam āryaḥ śāriputro, yo 'yaṃ bhagavatā prajñāvatām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_48_0: asya ca garbhasthasya mātrā jambūdvīpe sarvavādino nirgṛhītāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_49_1: apy evāhaṃ sumerumūrdhāruhya caturṇām api ratnākarāṇāṃ payaḥ pibeyam iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_50_0: atha tiṣyena dvijapravareṇendrajālapāramiprāptaṃ harim indrajālācāryam āhūya narasurāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragagandharvayakṣasamavāye devyā dauhadaṃ vinītam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_51_0: asya ca mātuḥ kukṣiniṣkrāntasya pitrā sarvanaimittikāḥ samāhūyoktāḥ:
S01sumagavu:sumav_51_1: paśyantu bhavantaḥ, kumārasya kiṃ prabhāvo bhaviṣyatīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_52_0: te cāvalokayitum ārabdhāḥ. kumārasya lakṣaṇodāratāṃ rūpodāratāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_52_1: na śaknuvanti vyākartuṃ kumārasyedaṃ prabhāvam iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_53_0: athāmbaragatena mahābrāhmaṇā teṣām saṃśayam apanayanārthaṃ brāhmaṇasvareṇāvaghoṣitam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_54_0: eṣa kumāraḥ śākyamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kariṣyati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_55_0: idānīṃ vādinaś cāsya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya cirakālābhilaṣitāṃ vācam api na niścārayanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_55_1: kaḥ punar vādo. vādakaraṇe ayaṃ bhagavatā evam uktaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_56_3: asyāḥ pṛthivyās tṛṇakāsṭhaśākhāparṇasadapramāṇaṃ kalamānāṃ parikṣayaṃ paryāyena gacchet,
S01sumagavu:sumav_56_4: na tv evāsya śāriputrasya prajñāyāḥ kṣayaṃ vadāmi.
S01sumagavu:sumav_57_0: yāvat sarvasattveṣu prajñā 'sya sarvotkṛṣṭā yāvat tribhuvavāsisakalanarāmarasurasya
S01sumagavu:sumav_58_0: anyam apy uktam: caturāryasatyasaṃkṣepavistaravibhāgavidhikathāvasare nāsty utpattiṣv asya samo jagati pratyekabuddho 'pi,
S01sumagavu:sumav_59_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ sauvarṇaṃ parvatam abhinirmāya nānāmṛgagaṇopetaṃ nānāprasravākulaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇākīrṇaṃ nānāvṛkṣopaśobhitaṃ tatropaviṣṭaḥ sa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_60_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_60_1: sumāgadhe, ayaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ suvarṇam parvatam abhiruhyāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_61_0: sā kathayati: nāyam āryo mahākāśyapo, 'yaṃ bhagavatā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhūtaguṇadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_62_2: yavānām aśītibhiḥ khāryaṃ, ṣoḍaśa dāsagrāmam, aṣṭādaśa mahābhāktagrāmāḥ, anekaśatasahasrāṇi vastūny upakaraṇaṃ samutsṛjya pravrajitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_63_0: punar aparaṃ: sarvaśrāvakānāṃ samakṣam ayaṃ bhagavatārdhāsanenopanimantritaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_63_3: iti kṛtvā, pratigṛhītāśeṣā yā aparigraha iti na gṛhītaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_63_4: yaś ca bhāgineyām abhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ janapadakalyāṇīsadṛśīṃ tām apahāya pravrajitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_64_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana airāvaṇagajavaravilāsagāminaṃ paramasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyañjanopetapuṇyadarśanaṃ hastinam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_65_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ nāgendrarathenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_66_0: sā kathayati: nāyam āryo mahāmaudgalyāyano, 'yaṃ bhagavatā ṛddhimatām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_67_0: anena śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_67_1: yojanasahasraṃ samantāt, parikṣepeṇa caturaśītibhiḥ stambhasahasraiḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_68_0: nandopanandau nāma nāgarājānau sumerubhṛguṇapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvāvasthitau ca vinītau.
S01sumagavu:sumav_69_0: punar apy anena bhagavān evam uktaḥ:
S01sumagavu:sumav_69_1: evaṃ hi bhadanta vaijayante durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraṃ kāntāraṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_70_0: saṃmukhaṃ me bhadanta bhagavato 'ntikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukham udgṛhītam:
S01sumagavu:sumav_71_0: tad icchāmy asyā mahāpṛthivyāḥ pārthivaḥ praṇīto rasadhātuḥ tam ūrdhvaṃ kartuṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_72_0: bhagavān āha: kasmin sthāne sthitvā mahāpṛthivīṃ parivartayasīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_73_0: eṣa evam āha: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍābhyāṃ stāne mahāpṛthiviṃ parivartayiṣyāmi.
S01sumagavu:sumav_74_0: bhagavān āha: ye pṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ prāṇinas tān kathaṃ kariṣyasīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_74_1: eṣa evam āha: ye pṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ prāṇinas tān vāmena pāṇinoddhṛtya dhārayiṣyāmi,
S01sumagavu:sumav_75_0: tadyathā, bhadanta, balavān puruṣaḥ kadalīpatraṃ parivartayan paramalaghusaṃjñī bhavati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_75_1: evam evāhaṃ bhadanta, mahāpṛthivīṃ parivartayan paramalaghusaṃjñī bhaviṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_76_0: sādhu sādhu, maudgalyāyana, śakyasi tvam anayā ṛddhyānenopāyena mahāpṛthivīṃ parivartayitum iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_77_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ sphaṭikamayaṃ kūṭāgāram abhinirmāya marakatenācchāditaṃ nānāratnastambhopanibaddhaṃ pravālavedikopaśobhitaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_77_1: tatra paryaṇkaḥ prajñaptaḥ paṭikāstṛto goṇikāstṛtaś citrikāstṛtaś tūlikāstṛtaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_77_2: yāval lohitopadhānas, tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.

S01sumagavu:sumav_156_2: deva, nāyaṃ roditi, kiṃtu devasya kāṣṭhadhūpena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,
S01sumagavu:sumav_157_0: rājā tatra tayā divyamānuṣikayā śriyā upacaryamāṇo na niṣkrāmati;
S01sumagavu:sumav_158_1: kumāra, devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ praviśya pramattaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_159_0: tena gatvā ukto: deva, kiṃ tvam atra pariviśyāvasthito, rājakṛtyāni rājakaraṇīyāni parihīyanta iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_160_0: rājā kathayati: kumāra, na śakto 'si tvam ekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum.
S01sumagavu:sumav_161_0: rājā jyotiṣkasya mukham nirīkṣya kathayati: kumāra, satyam. deva, satyam. saptamo divaso vartate.
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_0: kumāra, kathaṃ rātriḥ prajñāyate divaso vā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_1: deva, puṣpāṇāṃ saṃvikocavikāsān, maṇīnāṃ jvalanājvalanāt, śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt; santi tāni kusumāni yāni rātrau vikasanti na divā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_2: santi yāni divā vikasanti na rātrau;
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_3: santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvalanti na divā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_4: santi ye divā jvalanti na rātrau;
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_5: santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti na divā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_162_6: santi ye divā kūjanti na rātrau.
S01sumagavu:sumav_163_0: kumāra, avitathavādī bhagavān, yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtaḥ tathaiva nānyathety uktvā jyotiṣkasya gṛhān niṣkrāntaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_164_0: ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇir apahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_164_1: tena yata eva gṛhītas tatraiva gatvāvasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_165_0: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati: dārakānaya taṃ maṇim, paśyāmīti. sa muṣṭiṃ vighāṭya kathayati:
S01sumagavu:sumav_167_0: sa āha: kumāra, na tvayāpahṛto, nāpy anenāpi tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītas tatraiva gatvāvasthito;
S01sumagavu:sumav_167_1: 'pi tu, kumāra, svakaṃ te gṛhaṃ yāvadbhir maṇibhir anyena vā prayojanam tāvad gṛhāṇa yathāsukham iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_168_0: sa pratibhinnakaḥ saṃlakṣayate: yadā pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā grahīṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_169_0: yadājātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_169_1: svayam eva ca paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_170_0: eṣa samlakṣayati: yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_170_1: sa mām marṣayatīti. kuta etan. nūnam ayaṃ madgṛham āgacchatu,
S01sumagavu:sumav_170_3: deva, bibhaktam eva. kim atra vibhaktavyam. madīyaṃ gṛham āgaccha. ahaṃ tvadīyaṃ gṛham āgacchāmīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_171_0: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati: śobhanam, evam kuru. sa tasya gṛhaṃ gataḥ. eṣo 'pi ajātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatah.
S01sumagavu:sumav_171_1: sā śrīs tasmād gṛhād antarhitā yatraiṣa jyotiṣkas tatraiva gatā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_171_2: evaṃ yāvat sapta vārān antarhitā prādurbhūtā ca.
S01sumagavu:sumav_172_0: ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate: evam api mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīn apahartum,
S01sumagavu:sumav_173_0: tena dhūrtapuruṣāḥ prayuktā: gacchata, jyotiṣkasya gṛhān maṇīn apaharateti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_175_0: anena jyotiṣkena śrutam, anenāśayato vāg niścarita: tiṣṭhantu dhūrtakā iti. teṣāṃ yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ, sa tatraivāsthitaḥ, yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_176_0: mahājanakāyena dṛṣṭās, te kathayanti: bhavanto 'nena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopita,
S01sumagavu:sumav_177_0: ajātaśatruṇāsya jyotiṣkasya dūto 'nupreṣito: muñcata, mamāyaṃ khalīkāra iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_178_0: anena jyotiṣkenāśayato vāg niścāritā: gacchantu dhūrtakā iti. te gatāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_179_2: sa māṃ na praghātayisyatīti. kuta etat. sarvathāhaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto:
S01sumagavu:sumav_179_3: mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kariṣyatīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_181_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān kapphiṇo vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_182_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_182_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_183_0: sā kathayati: nāyam āryaḥ kapphiṇo, yo 'yaṃ bhagavatā vigatamadadarpāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_184_0: yo 'yaṃ rājā mahākapphiṇa ekasmin samaye aṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_185_0: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
S01sumagavu:sumav_185_1: asti, bhavantaḥ, kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughas tadyathā mamaitarhīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_186_0: yāvad anena mahākapphiṇena rājñā śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtaṃ preṣitam:
S01sumagavu:sumav_186_2: śīghram āgantavyam; anyathā ced uttamena daṇḍena samanuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_187_0: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ samāgamya śrāvastīṃ gatvā bhagavate etad vṛttāntaṃ nivedayanti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_188_0: bhagavatā te samāśvāsitā, uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_189_0: bhagavatā jetavanam catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaraṃ catvāro mahārājā dauvārikāḥ sthāpitāḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_189_1: airāvatasadṛśā hastino, bālāhakasadṛśā, nandīghoṣasadṛśā rathā, vyāḍayakṣasadṛśā manuṣyāḥ, svayaṃ ca bhagavāṃś cakravartiveśam ātmānam abhinirmāya saptatālodgate mahāratnasiṃhāsane niṣaṇnāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_190_0: dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_191_3: śīghram āgantavyam, atha nāgacchasi, aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyamīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_192_0: dūtena mahākapphiṇasya tat sarvaṃ saṃdiṣṭaṃ niveditam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_193_0: ayaṃ kapphiṇo rājāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīm anupraveśya jetavanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_193_1: sahadarśanād asya yo rūpe rūpamada aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_194_1: aho bata, śakro devānām indra aindraṃ dhanur ādāyāgacched iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_195_0: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sārathiveśenaindraṃ dhanur upanāmitavān.
S01sumagavu:sumav_196_1: svayam eva tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣipto yena saptāyomayyo bheryaś chidrīkṛtās,
S01sumagavu:sumav_197_1: dhūnīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāraṃ iva kuñjaraḥ //
S01sumagavu:sumav_198_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
S01sumagavu:sumav_199_0: sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ, tato 'sya yo 'bhūd baladarpaḥ sa prativigataḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_200_0: tato bhagavatāsya cittam ājñāya rājaveśam antardhāpya dharmo deśitah.
S01sumagavu:sumav_200_2: tato dṛṣṭasatyaś ca bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_201_0: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ānandaḥ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_202_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_202_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_203_0: sā kathayati: nāyam ārya ānandaḥ, ayaṃ ca bhagavatā indriyaguptadvārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_204_0: ayaṃ ca bhagavataś caturbhir aṅgulair ūnaḥ suvarṇavarṇo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_205_0: anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe madhyamaṃ chattram āropitam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_205_2: yady etarhi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyad etarhi apy anena balacakravartirājyam akariṣyat.
S01sumagavu:sumav_206_1: ayaṃ ca bhagavato mātṛsvasāputro bhrātā bhavati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_207_0: atrāntarenāyuṣmān rāhulaś cakravartiveśam abhinirmāya saptaratnasamanvāgataś caturaśītyā bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ samanugamyamānaś caturaśītyā nāgasahasrair upoṣadhanāgarājapramukhaiś caturaśītyāśvasahasrair bālāhakāśvarājapramukhair caturaśītyā rathasahasrair nandīghoṣarathapramukhair anekaiś ca paurajānapadasahasrair nānāpaṭahaśaṅkhabherīninādair ucchritadhvajapatākopaśobhitam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_208_0: taṃ dṛsṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_208_1: sumāgadhe, 'yaṃ te sa śāstā, yo 'yaṃ cakravartiveśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_209_0: sā kathayati: nāyam āryo rāhulo, 'yaṃ bhagavatā śikṣakāmānām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_210_0: bhagavataḥ putro 'yaṃ pitur ujjhitāṃ śriyam uddyotamānaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_210_1: sarvacakravartiprativiśiṣṭatarām ṛddhim upadarśayann upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_211_3: kṛtvā buddhasuto 'bhyupaiti nabhasā veśaṃ ca rājñām ayaṃ
S01sumagavu:sumav_211_4: nāmnā rāhula ity aveti sumahate sampūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ //
S01sumagavu:sumav_212_0: bhittvorvīṃ jalavat prayānti munayaḥ kecit sṛjanto 'nalaṃ
S01sumagavu:sumav_212_1: ramyatoyadharā ivāśu jagati spaṣṭaṃ kṣaranto jalam /
S01sumagavu:sumav_213_2: yathāsamāhite citte bhagavataḥ kāyād raśmayo niścaranti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_213_4: yair ayaṃ loke udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsito yāvac ca śrāvastīṃ yāvac ca puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaram.
S01sumagavu:sumav_214_0: atrāntareṇa sarve lokā bhagavantam abhiniṣkramantaṃ paśyanti, mahāṃś ca pṛthivīcālo babhūva.
S01sumagavu:sumav_215_0: atha brahmā sahāṃpatir bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājñāya sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarair devair āgatya bhagavato dakṣiṇe pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_216_0: śakro 'pi devānām indraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarair devair āgatya vāme pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_217_0: tumburusupriyapramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi gandharvaśatāny āgatya bhagavato 'grato vividhair vādyagītanṛttaviśeṣair upasthānaṃ kurvanto gacchanti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_218_0: anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_219_0: upariṣṭāc ca bhagavato 'psaraso divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01sumagavu:sumav_220_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenānyatarasmin araṇyāyatane sapta ṛṣisahasrāṇi prativasanti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_221_0: adrākṣus te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātrimśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam,
S01sumagavu:sumav_221_2: sūryaprabhātirekaprabhaṃ, jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvatam, samantato bhadrakaṃ, havyāvasiktam iva hutavaham, kāñcanabhājanastham iva pradīpaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_222_0: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathacittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_222_3: daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ, yathāvāropitaṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_223_0: atha te ṛṣayo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_223_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte tasthuḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_224_0: tato bhagavatā teṣām ṛṣīṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_224_1: yāṃ śrutvā tair ṛṣibhir viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_225_0: atha te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paricārya saṃprasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_226_0: tena khalu samayena puṇḍravardhane nagare 'ṣṭādaśa dvārāṇy ababhūvan.
S01sumagavu:sumav_227_0: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: yad ahaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa pravekṣyāmi,
S01sumagavu:sumav_227_2: yan nv aham aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāya svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praveśayam iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_228_0: atha bhagavān aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāyā svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_229_0: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy āścaryāṇy atyadbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca:
S01sumagavu:sumav_229_3: nīcāni dvārāṇy uccībhavanti, saṃkṣiptāni viśālībhavanti, hastinaḥ kūjanti, aśvā heṣante, uṣṭrāḥ krośante, gāvo rambhante, vṛṣabhā nandante, mayūrāḥ kekāyante, gṛhagatāni ca vividhāni vādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_229_8: viṣapītā nirviṣā bhavanti, anyonyavairiṇo maitrīṃ pratilabhante,
S01sumagavu:sumav_230_0: evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā praviśya yena sumāgadhāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_231_0: atha sumāgadhā svayam eva gośīrṣacandanodakena bhṛṅgāraṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ pādodakam anuprayacchati bhikṣusaṃghasya ca.
S01sumagavu:sumav_232_0: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyaivam āha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_232_1: dhanyās te paravādivādamathanaṃ paśyanti ye te mukhaṃ
S01sumagavu:sumav_232_2: vistīrṇe sadasi sthitasya vacanaṃ śṛṇvanti ye vā mudā /
S01sumagavu:sumav_232_3: lābhas tasya mahān bhaviṣyati ca yaḥ pādau tava śrīnidher
S01sumagavu:sumav_232_4: mūrdhnā caiva karadvayena vinayāt saṃpīḍya vandiṣyate //
S01sumagavu:sumav_233_0: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_233_1: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_234_0: atha puṇḍravardhananivāsī janakāyo bhagavantam apaśyaṃs tadgṛhaṃ bhettum ārabdhaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_234_2: yataḥ sarvo mahājanakāya ādarśanagatam iva bhagavantaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca.
S01sumagavu:sumav_235_1: sphaṭikamayam abhūt tad eva ramyaṃ maṇikanakākṣaratnabhakticitraṃ /
S01sumagavu:sumav_235_2: sthitam iva purato munīndracandraṃ nagarajano 'pi nirīkṣate samagraḥ //
S01sumagavu:sumav_236_1: narā namanti sma munīndracandraṃ surā ivendraṃ bhavanodarastham //
S01sumagavu:sumav_237_0: atha bhagavān kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_238_0: tataḥ sumāgadhāpramukho 'ntarjanakāyas te ca nāgarās te ca ṛṣayas te ca devāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavantaṃ parivāryāvasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_239_0: tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ ca tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃpravedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_239_1: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścic chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_239_2: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ, kaiścid anāgāmiphalam, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_239_6: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S01sumagavu:sumav_240_0: yad bhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_241_2: āścaryaṃ bhagavann, āścaryaṃ sugata, yat sumāgadhayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_242_0: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvani buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya kāñcanamālayā yad buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_242_1: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kurute,
S01sumagavu:sumav_243_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ, bhikṣavo, 'tīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
S01sumagavu:sumav_243_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S01sumagavu:sumav_243_2: sa bārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve.
S01sumagavu:sumav_244_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kṛkī nāma rājā babhūva.
S01sumagavu:sumav_245_0: tasya duhitā kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā, tasyā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kāñcanamāleti nāma kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_246_0: sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā, rājñaḥ kṛkina iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_247_0: sā pañcaśataparivārā bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkrāntā, tasyā bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_248_0: tayā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'nitike mahān cittaprasāda utpanno,
S01sumagavu:sumav_249_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā kṛkinā daśa svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ:
S01sumagavu:sumav_250_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaś trastaś cintayati:
S01sumagavu:sumav_250_1: mā me itonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_251_0: tato rājñā svapnādhyāyavido brāhmaṇān āhūya svapnān niveditavān.
S01sumagavu:sumav_252_1: rājan, yā te sarvajanapriyā tasyā rudhireṇa yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_252_2: antrair nagaraṃ veṣṭavyam, evaṃ devasya śreyo bhaviṣyati,
S01sumagavu:sumav_252_3: svapnān dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā rājyajīvitahāriṇo 'nenopāyena svastir devasya bhaviṣyati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_253_2: varaṃ mamaiva maraṇaṃ, na tu kāñcanamālāṃ vyāpādayiṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_254_1: kāñcanamālayā dṛṣṭaḥ. sā kathayati: kim evaṃ cintāparo, deva, iti. tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa niveditaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_254_2: sā kathayati: eṣa bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bārāṇasīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve,
S01sumagavu:sumav_254_4: yathā te bhagavān vyākaroti tathaivaṃ dhāraya.
S01sumagavu:sumav_255_0: tato rājā mahatā śrīsamudāyena kāñcanamālayā sārdhaṃ barāṇasyā nirgatya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_255_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_256_0: atha bhagavān kṛkinaṃ rājānaṃ dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati.
S01sumagavu:sumav_256_1: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīṃ babhūva.
S01sumagavu:sumav_257_0: atha kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān nivedyaivam āha:
S01sumagavu:sumav_257_1: mā me, bhagavaṃs, tatonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_0: bhagavān āha: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ, mahāraja, na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyatīti jīvitasya cāntarāyaḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_1: (1) yat tvaṃ, mahārāja, svapnam adrākṣīr, vātāyanena hastī nirgacchan puccho lagna iti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_2: bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_3: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_4: tasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle aśrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_5: te rudanto 'śrumukhān bandhūn utsṛjya pravrajya vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_8: tasyaiva śravakā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti śraddhānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_12: tasyaiva śrāvakāḥ śaktuprasthasya hetor indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_15: tasyaiva śrāvakās taṃ tīrthikavākyam anugṛhya saddharmeṇa samīkariṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_18: tasyaiva śrāvakā asaṃyatās te śīlavanto bhikṣūn niṣkāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_21: tasyaiva śrāvakā āryasaṃghasya pratipāditam ārāmaṃ saṃgham ālaṃbīkṛtya kecid abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñāḥ saṃghād ācchidya puṣpaphalaṃ svajanebhyo dāsyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_24: tasyaiva śrāvakā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā ātmanāpattim āpannāḥ śrāddhānām api bhikṣūṇām āpattiṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_26: markaṭasya rājyābhiṣekaḥ, tasmin samaye vikalendriyā api rājāno bhaviṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_28: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhir janair ākṛṣyate na ca śīryata iti,
S01sumagavu:sumav_258_34: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ, mahārāja, na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitāntarāyo vā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_259_0: tato bhagavatā tasya rājñas tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:sumav_259_1: yāṃ śrutvā caturaśītyā prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_260_0: kāñcanamālayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_261_0: kiṃ manyadhve, bhikṣavaḥ yāsau kāñcanamālā iyam eva sā sumāgadheti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_262_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
S01sumagavu:sumav_262_1: kiṃ bhadanta, kāñcanamālayā karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhye kule pratyajātā yena kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_263_0: bhagavān āha: kāñcanamālayaiva, bhikṣavaḥ, pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni.
S01sumagavu:sumav_263_1: kāñcanamālayaiva, bhikṣavaḥ, karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati. na, bhikṣavaḥ, karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhyapṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01sumagavu:sumav_263_2: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātāv, api tūpātteṣu eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca.
S01sumagavu:sumav_264_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
S01sumagavu:sumav_265_0: bhūtapūrvam, bhikṣavo, 'tīte 'dhvani bārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamā daridrā strī,
S01sumagavu:sumav_265_1: tayā pratyekabuddhasya caitye nānāvicitrāṃ palālamālāṃ granthayitvā samāropya prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:sumav_266_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatrayatropapadye 'haṃ tatratatra kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jāyeyam iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_266_1: kiṃ manyadhve, bhikṣavaḥ. yāsau daridrā strī, iyam asau kāñcanamālā. yad anayā prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_266_2: tena pañcajanmaśatāni kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā.
S01sumagavu:sumav_267_0: paṇadvayaṃ ca tayā paṭāntāvabaddhaṃ vimucyāryasaṃghāya dattaṃ;
S01sumagavu:sumav_268_0: atha bhagavān sumāgadhāpramukhaṃ puṇḍravardhananivāsinaṃ mahājanakāyam abhiprasādya prakrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_268_1: tathaiva rddhyā sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena śrāvastīm āgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:sumav_269_0: iti hi, bhikṣava, ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01sumagavu:sumav_269_1: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ. tasmāt tarhi, bhikṣava, ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01sumagavu:sumav_269_2: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya iti.
S01sumagavu:sumav_269_3: tasmāt tarhi, bhikṣava, evaṃ śikṣitavyam, yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāma ity evaṃ vo,
S01sumagavu:sumav_270_1: te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
